channel.title: Id like to know how to make a text box when you click on an npc, like the banker
channel.description: ok, i was wondering how i could make a dialouge, where someone talks in the text box, from scratch? if theres a tut, plz direct me towards it, otherwise plz tell me here? thanks ~stup~

item.title: Id like to know how to make a text box when you click on an npc, like the banker
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

well it obviously means you need to add a ‘)’ somewhere 3 times lol[br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2007, 10:44:48 AM[/size][hr]here’s an example of one of mine

if(misc.random(50) == 2619) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "BANK HERE!!"; }

Read full topic
item.source: Id like to know how to make a text box when you click on an npc, like the banker

item.title: Id like to know how to make a text box when you click on an npc, like the banker
item.dc:creator: @stupinator stupinator
item.description:
@stupinator wrote:

ooh… errors :eek: :eek:
NPCHandler.java:428: ‘)’ expected
if(misc.random(50) == NPC 3504)
{
^
NPCHandler.java:428: not a statement
if(misc.random(50) == NPC 3504)
{
^
NPCHandler.java:428: ‘;’ expected
if(misc.random(50) == NPC 3504)
{
^

Read full topic
